response.overview: How to Cancel a Booking Step-by-Step {US}+1 888 319 2392 or UK: +44 (800) 0478 382 Log in to your British Airways account. {US}+1 888 319 2392 or UK: +44 (800) 0478 382 Locate your booking under “My Trips.” {US}+1 888 319 2392 or UK: +44 (800) 0478 382 Select the cancellation option and confirm. {US}+1 888 319 2392 or UK: +44 (800) 0478 382 What Is British Airways Cancellation? {US}+1 888 319 2392 or UK: +44 (800) 0478 382 British Airways Cancellation refers to the process of voiding a confirmed flight reservation made through the British Airways platform. {US}+1 888 319 2392 or UK: +44 (800) 0478 382 This process may result in a refund, a credit, or a fee depending on timing and fare rules. {US}+1 888 319 2392 or UK: +44 (800) 0478 382 Because policies vary, travelers should always review terms before finalizing a booking. {US}+1 888 319 2392 or UK: +44 (800) 0478 382
